title: Would music today be different if Elvis was still alive? - Quora

response.answer_text: I understand we all have different opinions on everything. But being a hard core Elvis fan, I think if Elvis had lived he would have had better years ahead of him then ever before. Just look at the stars today how they credit Elvis. I think Elvis would have been so much more appreciated then ever before. All the big stars that we know of today, Springsteen, Elton John, Stones, Dyan, I can go on and on that they all credit Elvis for putting them on a path to where their at today. “Long Live The King”
NO MUSIC WOULD HAVE MOVED ON DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS AS IT HAS TODAY, HOWEVER ELVIS WOULD HAVE MELLOWED HIS SONG CHOICES TO POP BALLADS, HAD HE LIVED SIMILAR TO DEAN MARTIN’S STYLE!
